description:
Lately, Lucy hasn`t been able to talk to Hasebe outside of work. While looking for where he might be, somehow the section manager gets kidnapped?!
Meanwhile, Miyoshi reluctantly goes out to dinner with Jyoji. He ends up talking about only Hasebe, so she comes up with an idea, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Attention Anata o Nerau Amai Wana
Attention au gentil piège qui t`attend
Beware: The Sweet Trap That Tries to Lure You In
アテンション あなたを狙う 甘い罠
